hero.title: USAA Mobile Design System
hero.subtitle: Leading product management for enterprise mobile design system across 50+ development teams, achieving 80% adoption and transforming mobile development capability.

sections.title: Project Overview
sections.challenge: USAA, serving 13+ million military members and their families, needed to coordinate mobile development across 50+ teams while maintaining consistency and accelerating feature delivery for their comprehensive financial services platform.
sections.approach: Rather than building a comprehensive system upfront and mandating adoption, we took an advocacy-driven approach that started with high-pain teams and grew through demonstrated value.

phases.title: Discovery & Early Adopters
phases.description: Conducted comprehensive audit of existing mobile development practices and identified teams with the biggest pain points that our system could solve immediately.
outcomes: Identified accessibility compliance as key pain point
Selected 3 early adopter teams with urgent needs
Established success metrics and feedback loops

phases.title: Foundation & Quick Wins
phases.description: Built core components that solved immediate problems for early adopters, focusing on accessibility-compliant form components and navigation patterns.
outcomes: Developed 8 core components with accessibility built-in
